title: Is this a font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415022151im_/http:/typophile.com/files/header-back_5994.jpg)
  
(via [The Masterplan](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415022151/http:/www.themasterplan.in/))

Does anyone know if the text on left is an actual font, or just a stylized logo?

Thank you
author: amontonarpapeles

comments.content: looks to be a font, as the “e” and “t” are repeated.
Seems to have been built using glyphs from Times and Helvetica.

It’s [Kingthings Pique’n’meex](http://web.archive.org/web/20090415022151/http:/www.kingthingsfonts.co.uk/fonts/fonts.htm) (scroll down) by Kevin King. Quote: »A change is as good as a rest - fed up with detailed tweaking of foundation (coming soon) I loathe **Arial and Times** for their ubiquity«

_...Arial..._

Hm. Yes, I see that now.
